name: Revvolvver
description:
Revvolvver is a crazy multiplayer (up to four) platformer that places emphasis on accuracy. Hitting targets with all six of your revvolvvers bullets will win the game. Will you choose accuracy or brute force?

Plays best at HD 1920x1080.

Windows only. Requires XNA. Works with Xbox 360 controllers.

Art by Kenney.nl. Check out the Kenney donation pack on itch.io.

Power Up gameplay design by Ees
